description: Tofu is a complete source of protein.
name: Tofu & Mushroom Stroganoff Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 handful chives, finely chopped, to garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil in a large saucepan. Add the tofu and stir-fry over a high heat until golden. Remove from the heat and set aside.
Add the remaining oil to the saucepan, reduce the heat, add the onion and garlic, and fry until softened. Add the capsicums and mushrooms, and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
In a bowl, mix the cornflour with a little water to form a paste and set aside.

Add the tomato purée, peanut butter, and tofu to the saucepan. Stir in the vegetable stock and cornflour paste, and cook for 3 minutes. Add the crème fraîche, season to taste, and simmer for 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate, sprinkle with chives, and serve with rice.
